CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 9, 1955, pg. 1, reads: "Ford's Checker 'Club' - Cephus Ford (left), shown with Robert Pryor, his attorney, testified before Judge Ellenbogen Tuesday that what county detectives say is a gambling joint at 1408 Pasture Way is actually his 'checker club' which has about 10,000 members. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: J. Cephus Ford and Atty. Robert Pryor, standing in front of Judge Ellenbogen's courtroom in Allegheny County Courthouse
